SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class CtagsReader

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.CtagsReader
public class CtagsReader extends Object
Represents a reader of output from runs of ctags.

    CtagsReader.tagFields
    This should mimic https://github.com/universal-ctags/ctags/blob/master/docs/format.rst or http://ctags.sourceforge.net/FORMAT (for backwards compatibility).

    • getDefinitions

      public Definitions getDefinitions()
      Gets the instance's definitions.
      Returns:
      a defined instance

    • setSplitterSupplier

      public void setSplitterSupplier(Supplier<SourceSplitter> obj)
      Sets the supplier of a SourceSplitter to use when ctags pattern is insufficient, and the reader could use the source data.

      N.b. because an I/O exception can occur, the supplier may return null, which the CtagsReader handles.

      Parameters:
      obj - defined instance or null

    • readLine

      public void readLine(String tagLine)
      Reads a line into the instance's definitions.
      Parameters:
      tagLine - a defined line or null to no-op
